{"id":"thrum-chr","title":"Update sync-dev-docs.sh for thrum backup","description":"## Files

- Modify: `dev-docs/dev-scripts/sync-dev-docs.sh` (replace manual beads backup with thrum backup)

## Steps

### Step 1: Configure thrum backup with beads plugin
```bash
thrum backup plugin add --preset beads
```

### Step 2: Update sync script
Replace the manual beads backup section with a single thrum backup call:
```bash
# Refresh thrum + beads backup before syncing
echo 'Running thrum backup...'
(cd "$THRUM" && thrum backup --dir "$THRUM/dev-docs/backup" 2>&1) || echo 'Backup warning (non-fatal)'
echo 'Backup complete.'
```

This produces:
- dev-docs/backup/thrum/current/ (thrum data + beads plugin data)
- dev-docs/backup/thrum/archives/ (rotated zips)

### Step 3: Test the full flow
```bash
bash dev-docs/dev-scripts/sync-dev-docs.sh
ls dev-docs/backup/thrum/current/
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] sync-dev-docs.sh uses thrum backup instead of manual bd backup
- [ ] Beads data included via plugin system
- [ ] Backup dir uses repo name subfolder (thrum/)
- [ ] Script still syncs to thrumdev repo correctly","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"leon.letto@gmail.com","created_at":"2026-02-27T21:17:42Z","created_by":"Leon Letto","updated_at":"2026-02-27T21:17:42Z"}
